message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. I'm confident that you'll be happy with it. If you buy it, I'll even throw in a 30-day money-back guarantee. What do you say?
I'm willing to take the chance. I'll buy the product.

I'll take the offer. I'll buy the product and take advantage of the free inspection and repair service.
